reference_frame.name: upward_camera_only_vs_upward_camera_and_ground
reference_frame.pos_question: Does the camera move upward only relative to its initial viewing direction but not relative to the ground?
reference_frame.neg_question: Does the camera move upward relative to both the ground and its initial viewing direction?
reference_frame.pos_prompt: The camera moves upward only relative to its initial viewing direction but not relative to the ground.
reference_frame.neg_prompt: The camera moves upward relative to both the ground and its initial viewing direction.

reference_frame.name: downward_camera_only_vs_downward_camera_and_ground
reference_frame.pos_question: Does the camera move downward only relative to its initial viewing direction but not relative to the ground?
reference_frame.neg_question: Does the camera move downward relative to both the ground and its initial viewing direction?
reference_frame.pos_prompt: The camera moves downward only relative to its initial viewing direction but not relative to the ground.
reference_frame.neg_prompt: The camera moves downward relative to both the ground and its initial viewing direction.
